titleStmt.title: Caesars dialogue or A familiar communication containing the first institution of a subiect, in allegiance to his soueraigne
titleStmt.author: Nisbet, E.

notesStmt.note: "To the reader" signed: E.N., i.e. E. Nisbet.
In this state of the title page line 3 ends: Commu-.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
Appears at reel 325 and at reel 1973 (same copy filmed twice).
